steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Styles' group, click on the 'Styles Pane' button.
In the 'Styles Pane', click on the 'New Style' button.
In the 'Create New Style from Formatting' dialog box, enter a name for the new style.
Customize the formatting options for the new style as desired.
Click on the 'OK' button to create the new style.
Verify that the new style has been added to the 'Styles' pane.
